attributes.action: stop referring to 'homeowners' when he means home buyers.  I'm sick of seeing headlines like the one on his current page where he states 'homeowners will welcome this interest rate cut'.  I'm a homeowner because I do not have a mortgage, but I do have savings and I most certainly do not welcome the latest interest rate cut!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: Your title and petition should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement, about Government policy.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
